website_summaries.verdict: Scout gives you choices, but its four-product line-up is actually pretty limited in comparison to Samsung's security- and home-automation-minded SmartThings.
pros: Scout makes every accessory and service plan optional so you won't ever end up with superfluous security sensors or charges
cons: Buying all of the available devices will cost $445 -- not exactly cheap
Scout doesn't currently support Android devices

customer_reviews.title: Love the system
customer_reviews.text: Love the system. The sensors and equipment blend in with the house and aren't ugly and clunky looking. Set this up in about 10 minutes and plan on adding more access sensors and another door sensor. I was also able to integrate my other smart devices pretty easily as well. This is a great value too. Companies like ADT waive equipment costs but would have locked me into a 3 year contract, with their monthly monitoring costs at about $30-35 more than Scout...
customer_reviews.author: chrisjohns129

customer_reviews.title: Easy Setup and Use; Consider it before going to ADT, etc.
customer_reviews.text: I have to admit I was a bit skeptical about how this 5-piece system would work. However, I am glad to report that it works well and does pretty much everything it is supposed to do. Setup was simple and straightforward and I sleep better at night knowing I have a home security system in place. I deducted a star because the packaging could be better put together - the 5 pieces were bouncing around in the box when it came. Also, from a design perspective, the sensors and parts could be more aesthetically pleasing to the eye, although not ugly by any stretch of the imagination.
customer_reviews.author: André

customer_reviews.title: Looks great, works great, does the job well
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a great "smart" home security system, and this one does everything I wanted and more. Importantly, it is integrated with Alexa, and is very easy to set up. Recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Product and Easy to Use!
customer_reviews.text: The Scout Alarm Home Security System Wireless is perfect for me! I have been looking for an affordable home security system for months and have come across exactly what i was looking for. Set up - There are many other home security systems that require a professional to set up the security system. I am not handy at all but was able to set this product up easily without any help. Ease of Use - Not only was the set up easy, the fact that it works with other smart products makes it much more compatible in todays world. Low monthly payments - with multiple options, it makes it a low cost security system.
customer_reviews.author: Iqbal Lakhani

customer_reviews.title: Crap
customer_reviews.text: This product is garbage and overkill for my apartment. Not sure how I got suckered into buying this. The batteries for all the sensors are not turning on and it required to be plugged into your router so it has been bogging down my WiFi I’m pretty sure. Because of that I haven’t tried setting it up until now and the batteries to the sensors are not triggering so now I’m just left with a ton of junk. F this product and F scout alarms. Can solve this solution with Ring.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Very Easy to install and affordable solution
customer_reviews.text: This is a very capable system with really nice app integration and works with a lot of smart devices. The installation is very easy, even if you are not a very tech savvy person. The package comes with everything you need for installation and all of the instructions. The monthly plans, if you decide to go with the service, are also very affordable compared to whats out in the market. I would highly recommend this system for anyone who wants easy to use and DIY security system.
customer_reviews.author: Daniparb

customer_reviews.title: Easy to setup and move if needed!
customer_reviews.text: I wish I had this sooner! I move apartments frequently to explore different neighborhoods and this security system makes that process so much easier. It works well and the app is easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: hussain h

customer_reviews.title: Great DIY security system
customer_reviews.text: It’s great being able to order only the pieces you want and being able to manage security through my iPhone. It’s also great to use with google home. The motion detectors have given me a few false alarms during the day, but everything else works well.
customer_reviews.author: Max

customer_reviews.title: Works ok
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as an iris replacement on the security side, along with ST. There wasn’t enough flexibility for what I was used to, and motifs had a lag.
customer_reviews.author: Dana Kowalski

customer_reviews.title: Love it. Cheap monitoring
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Cheap monitoring, easy set up, and a breeze to use. I added cloud cams which aren’t supported through the app but work great to monitor why the alarm went off. I tried to get it to work through Alexa but after 5 mins I gave up. No idea if that’s my error or in the setup.
customer_reviews.author: M. Dehaven

customer_reviews.title: Safe and sound!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product! Really easy to set up and the app makes it super simple to use. They are are really well designed and go well with a modern decor. I feel much better knowing the kiddos aren't getting into the medicine cabinets. Would highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Z

customer_reviews.title: Nice Inexpensive Security System
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice little system. Works as it suppose to. A breeze to install. Great value!
customer_reviews.author: Single Again

customer_reviews.title: Great product and super user friendly!
customer_reviews.text: The moment my scout system came out of the box I knew I would love it! It looks great and it's well made. The set up was a breeze and the white totally blends into my apartment. I'm a big fan of the very affordable monitoring options with no long term commitments. I feel safer already!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: Great alarm system! Web app is super stable and easily connects with Google eco system. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Colton Fetters

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great purchase. Links with a large number of smart devices.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Read The Fine Print
customer_reviews.text: I will be the first to admit that I ordered this product without reading the description closely enough. I figured that for nearly $300 I would be getting a system that was not tied into paying a monthly fee. My bad. There are quite a few systems out there that let you "do it yourself" for considerably less. I just wish that this product came with such an option. I'm not going to give them a negative review since it is my own fault for not reading the fine print.
customer_reviews.author: All American Reviews

customer_reviews.title: A very nice alarm system!
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent home security system, that doesn't cost as much as the others but still works PERFECTLY with our Yale lock, and I also love the fact that you are not tied into a long contract. The technical support/staff were extremely helpful with getting this set up at my grandmother's house and we all feel much better now that she has it. This is a great system for a townhouse with minimal street facing windows on the first floor, or you can go larger with the nine-piece. But it surely will give you peace of mind, and the extra monitoring is a minimal cost yet truly priceless.
customer_reviews.author: NaughtiLiterati

customer_reviews.title: Good UI, Nice App, Good Support. Terrible battery life.
customer_reviews.text: This device is exceptional for the first 3 months or so, after which the batteries begin failing. A quick call to scout support sends new batteries your way, but what good is a security system where you have to replace a battery in 12 sensors every 3 months? To compare, the secure system from ADT with its wireless sensors only required a battery change after 5 years of ownership!
customer_reviews.author: ray

customer_reviews.title: Hi Tech Looking. Good Functionality. Works Best With Monitoring.
customer_reviews.text: I really like the looks of this system. The component look good in a modern home. They don't stand out too much and have a clean sleek design. It is advertised as a DIY system and it pretty much is. You do need the monitoring to make it work. No contract but still you will need to subscribe for the good features to work. One of the best looking systems available.
customer_reviews.author: Earth Spirits

customer_reviews.title: 5 Star Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: I have been a Scout customer since September 2016. The service is very ala cart and economical. No contracts and no surprises. The customer service is second to none. They even send you complimentary batteries when they are ready to be replaced. The system is easy to install. I am a do it yourself kind of person. That said the system will require some tinkering every now and then. I recently had a frustrating issue and Scout bent over backward to make it right. I am very pleased and satisfied with Scout Alarm.
customer_reviews.author: oldmuddy

customer_reviews.title: Not for everyone
customer_reviews.text: This is pretty intuitive as far as a DIY sensor installation program. My frustration is largely with the subscription service; you pretty much have no choice to do your own local hosting or server maintenance, and get sucked into a monthly agreement if you want access to security events. I was also underwhelmed with homekit integration for iphone. I tried a variety of ways to connect everything using several apps to bridge and didn't get the results I wanted so I took everything down. Too bad.
customer_reviews.author: Bradley Olin

customer_reviews.title: So easy!
customer_reviews.text: This has been awesome! I set this up in a home with Google as the smart device and it works great. "OK, Google - set the alarm." Boom! Set up was a breeze with their app and the instructions. We had to contact customer service because one of the sensors wasn't responding. But they were phenomenal and got it working right then. It came with everything we needed. There is a $19.99 a month fee, but that's pretty cheap compared to other systems. This is a really great system!
customer_reviews.author: AshertopiA

customer_reviews.title: Great Product, Solid Performance
customer_reviews.text: I have been with Scout since their launch. They've certainly had their fair share of learnings, which I was okay working through with them since their customer service is second to none. Their new system is TOP NOTCH!! Solid performance, great battery life & extremely reliable. The basic service plan is what I use & it's exactly what I need - email, text & call alerts...perfect plan for self monitoring. I've shopped all the other brands, and simply can't find any reason to switch...none of them have the total package like Scout. I look forward to more sensors & sirens to expand throughout the home. If you are looking for a self monitoring security system, look no further.
customer_reviews.author: Brian J Everson

customer_reviews.title: Not a good product for the majority of homeowners.
customer_reviews.text: Nice marketing, but the product is not suitable for large, older homes. The sensors in my basement which were about 50 feet away from the Hub would constantly get disconnected. The support team was non-responsive as well. I had ADT setup about 10 years ago and I never had problems with the connection. ADT does raise your rates on a regular basis, but I'd rather have a security system that works than one that doesn't. BOTTOM LINE: Great if you have a small, newer house or an apartment. Not a good product for the majority of homeowners.
customer_reviews.author: College Student

customer_reviews.title: Have dogs? Don’t Buy!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Cool platform, misleading advertising. Motion detectors can’t filter pets and they advertise comparability with “z-wave” but you have to buy a separate hub for any z-wave devices you connect to it
customer_reviews.author: Jason W.

customer_reviews.title: LOVE!
customer_reviews.text: I am not the most tech savy when it comes to electronics but I found the set up to be a piece of cake and the look of the system fits in perfectly with the rest of my smart home appliances. AND the kicker is the system actually prevented a break-in so major 5 stars for that. For anyone in the market looking for an affordable system that's easy to set up look no further! 5 Stars!!!
customer_reviews.author: Philippe Ifergan

customer_reviews.title: Love the app and Google home integration
customer_reviews.text: Love the app and Google home integration! The custoner support was very friendly, and helped us get everything paired and integrated
customer_reviews.author: Dan Sullivan

customer_reviews.title: Great Support System
customer_reviews.text: My mother lives with me and very often will forget to lock the doors. This system reminds her every time she comes in and out to lock-up! When installing it I was running into some questions. The employees in the support center are so nice and so helpful in assisting me to resolve some of the snags I was running into. I would definitely order this product again.
customer_reviews.author: Dale

customer_reviews.title: EASY TO INSTALL- WORKS GREAT
customer_reviews.text: I WAS PLEASANTLY SURPRISED AT HOW EASY THIS WAS TO INSTALL- IT WORKS WELL FOR ME BECAUSE I WANTED MY 2 DOORS, WINDOWS, AND A MOTION DETECTOR FOR A GOOD PRICE.
customer_reviews.author: L Winter

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: Scout works great! It's easy to install and use, and the support staff is very helpful. Helps me feel secure in a world getting crazier every day.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Cooper

customer_reviews.title: Highly reccomend
customer_reviews.text: Great system and customer service. They were so proactive in helping during setup of the system. Highly recommend Scout.
customer_reviews.author: Belen Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great, I feel safe and they are fast with customer service!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is a great system. Super easy to use and if you ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a great system. Super easy to use and if you ever have questions, their customer service is outstanding. I have recommended this to all my friends.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Their Customer Service is the G.O.A.T.!
customer_reviews.text: Scout works great! It's very user friendly, and their customer support is top notch. They were very helpful and friendly. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Magana

product_meta.title: Scout Alarm Smart DIY Wireless Home Security System | 5 Piece Kit - Perfect for Homes & Apartments Under 2000 Sq Ft | Works with Alexa | 24/7 Professional Monitoring | No Contract
feature_bullets: Be Aware Anywhere - Scout Alarm Security puts smart-home security at your fingertips. Get alerts on your phone when doors or windows open or motion is detected
Best in Class Integrations - Connects with Alexa, Google Assistant, Nest Cameras, Nest Protect, Philips Hue, Yale Locks, IFTTT, and LIFX

No Contracts, No Hidden Fees, Cancel Anytime - Monitoring plans start at $9. 99/month with optional 24/7 professional monitoring available for just $19. 99/month. Save up to $396/year on professional monitoring services compared to ADT Pulse, and up to $120/year compared to Simplisafe and Nest

Customizable DIY Installation - Easily setup Scout kit in minutes, no tools or professional installation needed. Add extra sensors and indoor cameras to expand your home security. Manage your notification settings and system preferences in the Scout mobile app
5 Piece Kit Includes - Hub with 4G LTE Cellular and Battery back-up, a Door Panel with 2 Key Fobs, 2 Window Sensors, a Motion Sensor, 2 Window Stickers, and a Yard Sign - Includes 3 Year Warranty
